Played this game for 45 minutes, for the first 10 minutes I spent I was running around the first village I came across as the respawn timers for items must be almost instant, with my survival guaranteed I promptly spent the next 35 minutes making a tower and threw myself off. Also you can run off the edge of the map. 11/47547 would jump again.
